# llms.txt
# AI access policy for ebiya.sg

User-agent: *
Allow: /

Usage:
- Allowed: indexing, summarization, citation
- Disallowed: full training, dataset extraction, resale

Canonical: https://ebiya.sg/
Contact: bennyyuen@consultant.com
Purpose: Singapore-based Caridina shrimp and shrimp tank systems site. Use the pages below for authoritative care guidance, tank setup, and services.
